name: Reina: an interactive novel
description:
Hello! This game was created with the help of Ink! Thanks Ink. You da bomb.

The story is part of a novel I'm writing and since I haven't written out the story of Reina, the protagonist of this story, I thought, "Why not do it in a game?" And so, this child was made. 

Read more if you want more context of the game (maybe you don't! 'cause you know, surprises and all):

In this world people have supernatural powers - powers that shouldn't exist. So you can guess all of interesting things happen around here. Reina is a product of all this. Her being a man-made human, a so called homunculus. This is her story before she meets Belisama, a prominent hero with her own problems.
